page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area surveyed is situated approximately twelve miles north-west of Salisbury on Salisbury Plain.The area includes the village of Orcheston and the northern part of Shrewton. The surrounding countryside is farmland,a mixture of cultivated crops,improved grassland and enclosed rough grazing.The land also falls within the Ministry of Defence firing range boundary. There are numerous tracks and roads dissecting the ranges, although access is limited because of the army activities. There are a number of historical features such as ancient burial mounds and a Gibbet.
